Production Co: Touchstone Pictures, Corky Productions Inc., Robert Simonds Productions
Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, Dolby A, SDDS, DTS, Surround, Dolby Digital, Dolby SR
Synopsis: Corky Romano (Chris Kattan) receives a surprising call from his long-lost father, Pop (Peter Falk), an underworld crime lord who has been indicted by a grand jury. Corky must now get into the FBI and look for proof against his father. The hacker that helps him get into the FBI accidentally makes him look like a super agent. Now he must fake his way through one tough assignment after another.
Title: Corky Romano
